description:
In this episode, see high school boys bond with their father, get caught in an awkward situation, compete with each other, ruin their friend`s stuff, engage in small talk, get a love letter, get their souls crushed by a girl, and get annoyed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Danshi Koukousei to Chichi / Danshi Koukousei to Bungaku Shoujo 4 / Danshi Koukousei to Tousou / Danshi Koukousei to Kankeri / Danshi Koukousei to Zatsudan / Danshi Koukousei to Love Letter / Danshi Koukousei to Maai / Danshi Koukousei to Ira / Joshikousei wa Ijou "Tousou"
